attributes.additional_details: Chris Tappin has been extradited to America without any just reason.  The retired businessman is facing up to 35 years in jail in America if found guilty for a crime it doesn't appear he committed. Why should we kowtow to America if they want to extradite a UK resident without any evidence that they have a case against them?  The UK cannot extradite people from America without evidence against them.  It is outrageous that the British government has allows this.
